title: AI chat with any data source (using the n8n workflow tool)
author: David Roberts
readme:
This AI agent can access data provided by another n8n workflow. Since that workflow can be used to retrieve any data from any service, this template can be used give an agent access to any data.

Note that to use this template, you need to be on n8n version 1.19.4 or later.
readme_html:
This AI agent can access data provided by another n8n workflow. Since that workflow can be used to retrieve any data from any service, this template can be used give an agent access to any data.

Note that to use this template, you need to be on n8n version 1.19.4 or later.
readme_zh:
该AI代理可访问由另一n8n工作流提供的数据。由于该工作流能从任何服务中检索任意数据，此模板可用于让代理获取所有数据权限。

请注意，使用此模板需确保n8n版本为1.19.4或更高。
title_zh: 与任意数据源的AI聊天（使用n8n工作流工具）
